name: RFTM
body:
The RFTM is an Open Source, collaborative testing methodology that can be applied to all Radio Frequency (wireless) technologies. Throughout this methodology, we'll use various real-world wireless protocol examples

[Signals and Modulation](basics.html)

[Information Sources](information_sources.html)

[Receiving Signals](receiving_signals.html)

[Developing an FSK receiver step-by-step](fsk_receiver.html)

[Developing an ASK receiver step-by-step](ask_receiver.html)

[Transmitting Data](transmitting_data.html)

[Developing an FSK transmitter step-by-step](fsk_transmitter.html)

[Signals identification](signals_identification.html)

Example flow-graphs and tutorials
=================================
